mapper.sql: id, sys_key, sys_name, sys_value, parent_id, order_no, status, remark
mapper.insert: insert into sys_dict (id, sys_key, sys_name, sys_value, parent_id, order_no, status, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sysKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_dict set sys_key = #{sysKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_name = #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_value = #{sysValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
